entrypoint:
python -m evaluator evaluate huggingface --config '{
    "name": "test_run_hugging_face/e899341d-bada-4f3c-ae32-b87bf730f897",
    "model": { "path": "hf://facebook/bart-large-cnn" },
    "tokenizer": { "path": "hf://facebook/bart-large-cnn", "mod_max_length": 1024 },
    "dataset": { "path": "s3://lumigator-storage/datasets/c404aa33-4c4c-4a59-845e-01e10ad22226/thunderbird_gt_bart.csv" },
    "evaluation": {
        "metrics": ["rouge", "meteor", "bertscore"],
        "use_pipeline": true,
        "max_samples": 10,
        "return_input_data": true,
        "return_predictions": true,
        "storage_path": "s3://lumigator-storage/jobs/results/"
    }
}'
